summary: I HAVE A 2017 FORD EXPLORER WITH 5500 MILES AND NOTICED THE TIRES ARE HAVING UNEVEN WEAR THEY ARE HANKOOK VENTUS S1 NOBLE 2 IN 255/50/20  5MN1AH 1316  THIS IS A KNOWN ISSUE AND THESE SHOULD BE COVERED UNDER THE FACTORY/ TIRE WARRANTY AS IT STATES FROM 1 MILE TO 12K MILES IT IS COVERED 100% IN THE MANUAL AND HANKOOK WANTS TO PRO RATE THE TIRES FOR A DEFECT THAT IS CAUSED MY THE MANUFACTURING PROCESS SHAME ON THEM
